subject: Soccer

Money Laundering
Bail
Corruption (Institutional)
Racketeering and Racketeers
lead_paragraph: Héctor Trujillo, a former top Guatemalan soccer official caught up in the United States’ investigation of FIFA, was held for the past week in solitary confinement at a Brooklyn detention center.
snippet: Héctor Trujillo, a former top Guatemalan soccer official caught up in the United States’ investigation of FIFA, was held for the past week in solitary confinement at a Brooklyn detention center.
